properties.name: component
properties.description: An alias for the [template] property specified in React. Accepts a custom component. Refer to [Using a Custom Component] for more information.

properties.name: icon
properties.description: Specifies the icon to be displayed on the toolbar item.

properties.name: menuItemComponent
properties.description: An alias for the [menuItemTemplate] property specified in React. Accepts a custom component. Refer to [Using a Custom Component] for more information.

properties.name: menuItemRender
properties.description: An alias for the [menuItemTemplate] property specified in React. Accepts a rendering function. Refer to [Using a Rendering Function] for more information.

properties.name: render
properties.description: An alias for the [template] property specified in React. Accepts a rendering function. Refer to [Using a Rendering Function] for more information.
